Project Four: Suggested Boards to Visit
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Miscellaneous Q&A: Project Four: Suggested Boards to Visit
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, September 9, 2004 - 08:37 pm:

If you know of a board you think should be listed in the Project Four post, please list it here.

I'd like to see boards with a minimum of ads (hopefully without popups!), and a large membership. They should be boards primarily about gaming, or at least social forums.

Political, specialty, and forums where game talk is off-topic will not be accepted.
